## Data Explorer

Here you can view data submitted via the Programmes and Events form since **July 1, 2021**.

The data was last refreshed on **`r stamp("Sunday May 1, 2000 at 1.30pm")(lastModified(files))`**.

```{r data_explorer_table, echo=FALSE}

data_explorer <- session_data

reactable(
  data_explorer,
  filterable = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  minRows = 10,
  highlight = TRUE,
  details = colDef(
    html = TRUE,
    details = JS("function(rowInfo) {
      return 'Details for row: ' + rowInfo.index +
        '<pre>' + JSON.stringify(rowInfo.row, null, 2) + '</pre>'
    }")
  )
)
```
